page.title: 08RESTAURANTS AND PUBS
page.content: The{Sheriff's Lodge}is both a restaurant and a pub.Built in{1500}and called the{Black Swan}it once supplied ale to the{Cistercian Monks at Rufford {Abbey}just outside Edwinstowe. It is often used for{Wedding {Receptions}but people of all ages use it as a pub.There are twelve staff. A pint of{beer}costs{70p}but{cocktails} cost{Â£1.50}.The most popular drink is{ {Beer}and most popular food {Steak {Diane. { The Royal Oak's}most popular meal is{Plaice and Chips.}The Royal Oak is 51 years old but the {Jug and Glass} was built in{1877}and their popular dish is{Gammon. The Manvers}named after the Manvers family at Thoresby was built in 1977 and mostly serves{ {Bitter}but{Lager}is also popular.Their clients love{pie and chips.}There are 5 pubs,2 clubs and 3 restaurants here.
